pros: Very great senior techs, great teaching hospital with new facilities.
cons: There is a lack of communication, compassion and understanding of the managers toward the techs. The schedules are often hectic and done last minute. There is a lack of flexibility for vacation time or off days. Moreover, managers even question employees why they call in sick. Techs are overworked and assistants are even cut during high periods. Management prioritizes new employees for scheduling over senior techs showing that your work is not valued in the long run.
